text:
[Verse]
In the night light flickers
Shadows dance no whispers
We move like we're dreamers
In a world of believers

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on the pavement
Heartbeats in amazement
Stars are just our ceiling
We chase this endless feeling

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows in the moonlight
Lost in magic of the midnight
Side by side we take the flight
Hearts aglow we burn so bright

[Verse 3]
Neon lights are guiding
From the world we're hiding
City's pulse we're riding
Every move aligning

[Bridge]
Time it keeps on slipping
To each beat we're dipping
All our fears are chipping
In this rhythm gripping

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows in the moonlight
Lost in magic of the midnight
Side by side we take the flight
Hearts aglow we burn so bright
title: Dancing Shadows
